ing: 1/2 cup white sugar, or to taste
1 watermelon, cut into cubes and seeded
2 spearmint leaves, or more to taste
des:
"This is one of my favorite recipes and it is also very easy to make and helps a lot in summer and prevents dehydration. 
Have a happy summer!"
ins: Blend ice and sugar together in a blender until slushy, 1 to 2 minutes. Add watermelon and blend until smooth; pour into glasses and garnish with spearmint leaves.
